name: Paddle Clash
description:
Completely new game that combines the best of Ping Pong and Breakout styles!

Have you enjoyed classic arcade Ping Pong or Breakout style games? Then you will surely love this completely new approach to those games that redesigns the Brick Breaker concept. 

* 48 fresh and fun levels!
* Different paddles, balls, backgrounds that you unlock as you progress in campaign!
* Two players on one phone!
* Four different types of gameplay: duel, clean bricks, bonus collect, move bricks!
* Huge number of different bonuses!
* Classic black and white ping pong game!
* A decent amount of humor!
